metadata.description: Explore the full Olive Garden drink menu for Summer 2025. From classic non-alcoholic lemonades to signature cocktails, find the perfect beverage to accompany your meal.

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: Olive Garden‚Äôs drink menu adds the perfect sip to every meal. From classic non-alcoholic lemonades to signature cocktails, there‚Äôs something for everyone. For a lighter option, the Raspberry Lemonade brings flavor with only 170 calories.

NON-ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES.description: Quench your thirst with a refreshing selection of sodas, lemonades, iced teas, and more.

items.name: Raspberry Lemonade
items.review: So refreshing! üçã The perfect balance of sweet and tart. It's the ultimate thirst quencher. Plus, it's bottomless. What's not to love? ü•§

items.question: Does Olive Garden Drink menu offer free refills on drinks?
items.answer: Yes, Olive Garden provides complimentary refills on soft drinks, raspberry lemonade, teas, fruit juices, and ‚ÄúCaff√® la Toscana‚Äù upon request.

items.question: Are there non-alcoholic beverages available at Olive Garden?
items.answer: Yes, Olive Garden offers a variety of non-alcoholic beverages, including Italian Bottled Water, Raspberry Lemonade, Classic Lemonade, Fresh Brewed Iced Tea, Flavored Iced Teas, and Fountain Drinks.

items.question: Are there kid-friendly beverage options at Olive Garden?
items.answer: Absolutely, Olive Garden offers a variety of kid-friendly beverages, including Milk, Fruit Juices, and Lemonade.
